text: Hello. Iâ€™m having issues with current email template and need input on what to do.. Is it possible to have a direct or zoom call with a developer to help me with my issue?
Hi team! I have a user trying to edit an email template who needs support on editing the code. Is that something we can do here? Thanks!

Hey Said, it depends on the type of email. If it is "drag-and-drop" then you will be limited to the "view source" button in the rich text editor for any compatible modules. Some will not be available at all for direct code editing,

For coded emails or the old, "visual builder" system, you have a lot more flexibility, from directly editing the template in a coded template or editing CSS code directly in the head.
